phrs.translation: 汉诺威, 汉诺威机场, 哈吉, 人才激励板报
施辛德勒罗夫哈吉酒店
多么, 怎样, 何等

sentences.sentence: Al-Haj is one of three men sent to Sudan from Guantanamo on Thursday.
sentences.translation: 阿勒·哈吉是星期四从关塔那摩送往苏丹的三人之一。

sentences.sentence: Not exactly what would-be pilgrims wanted to hear, as they anxiously await their permits for the haj.
sentences.translation: 这对焦急地等待着朝圣许可的准朝圣者来说可不是什么好消息。

sentences.sentence: The case of Sami al-Haj has gotten considerable attention over the years because of his work as a journalist.
sentences.translation: 阿勒·哈吉的案子几年来一直引人注目，原因是他的记者职业。
